text: The Martial Temple of [[Dol Arrah]] is an academy of war in [[Starilaskur]], [[Breland]] that specializes in honing the talents of [[Vassal|Sovereign Host]] [[cleric]]s and [[paladin]]s. The Martial Temple also provides supplies and other support to the [[Heavenly Fleet]] in the [[Lhazaar Principalities]].
title: Martial Temple of Dol Arrah
